website_summaries.verdict: Easily add a pop of color with these stylish polka-dot decals.
pros: A simple way to add a pop of color to any child's bedroom
A wall decal that they will not quickly grow out of
Multi-sized polka dots can be positioned in any pattern you choose
Easy to apply and reposition without causing damage
cons: Colors are not quite as vibrant as shown in pictures

customer_reviews.title: Fun pop of color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stickers to add a temporary pop of color to my kid’s bland bathroom. I wanted something that could be easily removed when they grow and their interests change. I am so happy with my purchase! The stickers are great quality and easily removed. The amount of stickers can cover a wide area. I still had some extra after covering 12ft high by 8ft wide area. Most importantly, my kids love their bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to add color to our new Playroom. I LOVE them so much. It was part of the basement we walled off and painted bright white. These add the perfect amount of color. My 1 year old Grandson squeals when we walk down the stairs and see it. I found this pic at TJ Maxx and it worked perfectly. Also added the planets to the end from another amazon purchase. LOVE IT~~
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Move Around! so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Added much fun to my drab office! Children love them. I work at a school. Easy to remove and reapply wherever also they can be written on with dry erase markers. Just don’t smear the marker onto the wall, because walls don’t take dry erase markers well lol.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea mccarty

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit smaller than I expected (largest is smaller in diameter than a marker) and there are far fewer of the large ones. But still fun to put up. We only used half the sheets so far but I’m pleased. No word as to how easy or clean these will lift after leaving them on for awhile. As far as immediately lifting to move that isn’t a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Go on easy and come off easy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I used them in multiple places. On painted letters, on my kiddos walls and on a bookshelf. They stick amazing and haven’t come off once. I rearranged some and they come off fine and restuck fine as well and haven’t moved.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fun, stick well.
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love these! I bought them to put in a suitcase for our overseas move. When we arrived, these helped our kids more quickly feel at home. They were a little hard for my son to peel off the paper, but I didn’t have any problems really. They stuck to our textured walls well, and they look really bright and fun in the kids’ room. I’ll definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Cayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little wall decals! Easy to use, easy to take off and reposition/relocate. I’m in the middle of a redecoration project for a kiddo’s bathroom. These perfectly complement the bright, cheery theme! I’m sure once it’s all finished, these will look even more amazing with everything tied together.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for playroom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's playroom. I love the bright colors and the variety. They add a nice pop of color to the room and look really good. They also stick to the wall great. There's a lot of the smallest dots, which is nice to fill in empty spots. I do wish there were some more of the bigger dots.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but permanent
customer_reviews.text: Love lovelove these dots. I put them up in the kids bathroom and have gown tons of compliments. They are NOT repositionable after about an hour though and they WILL peel your paint. Don't care. They are covering tons of holes and scratches right now. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quality stickers, a lot thicker than I expected. They added a fun pop of color to my toddlers room without having to paint. They were easy to peel and stay on the wall nicely while still being able to unpeel and move them if need be. When she saw the finished product she kept saying ‘wow’ :) Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun ... and easy !!
customer_reviews.text: So nice. I just gave the kids the stickers and told them to go wild !! They loved it ... and even decorated surprisingly tastefully ! The stickers are easy to apply, stay attached (for months so far), and are very easy to remove, leaving no residue!! 5*
customer_reviews.author: kobroic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ADHESION ON ANY SURFACE
customer_reviews.text: THESE STICKERS ARE AMAZING. SO MUCH BETTER ADHESION THAN THOSE JELLY WALL DECALS. ESPECIALLY SINCE MY WALLS ATE TEXTURED AND THE HELLY INES FALL OFF, THESE DONT. THE COLORS ARE NICE BUT COULD OF BEEN MORE COLORFUL AND MORE PRIMARY COLORED AND NOT SO MUCH DARK COLORS. IM GOING TO PURCHASE A SECOND SET. THEY ALSO COULD OF HAD MORE BIG CIRCLES SO THE DISTRIBUTION OF DECORATION WOULD BE MORE EVEN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall stickers
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Would buy them again easy to stick on easy to remove
customer_reviews.author: Oshia

customer_reviews.title: Totally adorable with one cautionary note....
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful and so very cute. We love the way they look, especially on the walls of of our grandson’s closet, which we turned into a ball pit. The only downside is that when he decided to rearrange some dots, a few of the larger ones removed paint.
customer_reviews.author: DProf

customer_reviews.title: Colors do not look the same as pictures
customer_reviews.text: Based on the pictures I thought these were bright colors, like primary yellow and blue, etc. But they are actually muted colors, the yellow is more like a mustard color than a bright yellow. I bought these to add to some other wall stickers that are already in my child's room, and these really don't match so I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Ryberg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are so GREAT! They were super easy to use. The adhesion was perfect--strong enough to stick to the wall, but not so strong that you couldn't pull one off if you ended up wanting it somewhere else. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kaye

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and easy to put on! Definitely brought some color to our new play room. We will be getting more to fill our wall more but so far these are great!
customer_reviews.author: RoRoBug

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Many of the stickers were hard to remove. The backing paper kept coming off the sheet still attached to the sticker. The Lavender is actually a dark grey. But the look nice i the kid room
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and colorful! They added a great pop of color to our kids' bathroom. I had to move a couple around and they came off easily. They also continued to stick when replaced. Great variety in sizes and colors!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Silveri

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Brought a pop of color to my daughter room
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These stick very well, but left no damage or residue when removed. They look great and there was A LOT in the pack. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainCraboo

customer_reviews.title: Bright the room
customer_reviews.text: These dots are colorful enough to bright the room, only when I try to peel one off a week later, it took some effort to not to ripe the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Yuan

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! Professional packaging. Easy to place without bubbling. Easy to remove and restick if you change your mind about placement. Super cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: librarygirl

customer_reviews.title: This is great for unisex kid's room!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different colors this had to offer. We bought this for our toddler son and daughter's room, and used the colors of their choice on their side of the wall. It was easy to peel, and after one month of hanging on the wall, I'm happy to say that the decals are sticking to the walls strong, and we haven't had any issues of peeling, even with the very warm and humid weather. Overall this was a Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I Put these in my 8 year olds room, she loves them. You can easily remove and stick again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a wall sticker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, HOWEVER they are NOT a wall sticker! They are basically normal stickers and they DO put off paint. I was so sad, as soon as we pulled off the first Circle circleI just KNEW. Tried it on the wall and it stuck like a child just put a real sticker on the wall and took off paint. :-( sad..
customer_reviews.author: Allison Carr

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old step daughter loves these and she put them on herself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of applying and bright colors. Thank you the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Wall Stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun pop of color in my daughters room. Easy to apply and remove. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Owens

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I threw these all over the walls in my kids playroom and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to use and have stayed on longer than I thought given we have a textured wall.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Reallly easy to put up. Moved a few around. Makes white walls look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: L. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids’ rooms
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and look really cool great gift for my 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vranian Grande

customer_reviews.title: Not removeable without damage.
customer_reviews.text: These completely tore up our paint and drywall on the walls. They are not moveable after they’ve stuck for a few moment to adhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value
customer_reviews.text: Put these up in my grandkids’ playroom. Very easy to apply and remove. Really gives the room a fun punch of color!
customer_reviews.author: Valorie C.

customer_reviews.title: Totally fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Totally fun art project today. My 8 yr old designed it and away we went!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy. Removes paint from wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but hard to remove. The sticker removes the paint from my wall. This can't be reused again once removed from the wall. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rajal M Solanki

customer_reviews.title: Awful Colors
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even take these out of the package as the colors were completely off from what was pictured. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My boys had a blast placing them on the wall. So much easier and cheaper than paint.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Colors were nothing like the picture, returned but haven't received credit yet..
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Happy colors!
customer_reviews.text: Like it! Made my son’s room more bright and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: They did take a little of the paint off the wall but they look great in my 1 yr old room. Made my 6 yr old want some for her room.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Cute decals
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Little hard to peel off paper but not terrible! Sticked very well to the wall and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even try these on the wall. The colors are nowhere near as bright as shown. The orange dots are actually brown, at least what I got. I personally really hate brown, and I never would have purchased these if I thought brown was included. Blah!
customer_reviews.author: HomeShareHero

customer_reviews.title: Invigorates your space in matter of minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Put this up in my office at work (in elementary school) and got many compliments, all from staffs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: A Touch of Whimsy for my Senior Bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they look like I've used a stencil to paint them on. It's really hard dressing walls in an apartment, but these removable decals have made it really easy to uplift my boring walls.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a little colorful fun to my child’s room. The price was right for these dots. And when they arrived I was pleasantly surprised at the quality. We had fun putting these on the wall...our child helped too!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love the colors !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little ones. Colorful colors keeps the amazed for hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: color not like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The yellow sticker is not like in the picture! it's kind of dark-brownish something, please don't lie in the pictures of the product, this is cheap. Thankfully there's this review system!
customer_reviews.author: Mikail Dogan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pops of color!
customer_reviews.text: Limited on space and wanted to create an area for my 14mo. I had my 9yo old help me and was able to easily remove and reposition without messing up the wall or the circles. Definitely suggest!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Looks just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: the ease of removing from the paper and then installing. Easy to apply and remove if needed, and makes a great quality addition to a child’s room
customer_reviews.author: Luis R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great touch to a child’s bedroom or play room. Went on easy and fun to do together with your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and a great value for the number you get! My kids loved the bright colors they added to their play room
customer_reviews.author: Kayah

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! Great buy. The picture doesn’t even do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy and super cute
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a quick pop of color and easy design. Definitely livened up the kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Off Colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are much more muted than expected. They still look good in my kids playroom. They go up/move pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Berghoefer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These wall stickers are perfect! They added just the right touch for my DIY cubbies. And they stick great to textured walls and I've even moved them around some and they still stick great! You will not be disappointed if you purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this product. So fun!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the walls in my kids play room and I really loved how it came out, very easy to apply and easy to remove any time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It gives the room a pop of color. It is a perfect alternative to character wall decal, which they grow out of in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable!! Easy to use, exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Robin JF Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great touch to my granddaughter’s bedroom! She loves the polka dots ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fun decoration that the kids can help with too. They can be removed and re-adhered easily, allowing kids to have continued fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blah colors
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t love the colors. Ended up taking down all the maroon, gray, yellow and red ones and ordering a different pack to get brighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Andrianos

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! Ordered them and another peel and stick for my daughters “art room” aka closet! They make the space look like more then just a closet!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to take off without removing any paint off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a little thicker. Otherwise, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, fun to put up, colorful
customer_reviews.text: I loved that you can place them however you want to. My son helped me put them up. It was so much fun & it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Suellen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO USE AND REMOVE. KIDS LOVED THE DECALS!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO BOOST LOOK IN KIDS ROOM :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and remove
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my NB nursery and they look great. My daughter saw them and wanted me to order some for her room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jharonee' Pea

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use and add fun color to the space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my classroom, easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall decals
customer_reviews.text: Colorful wall decals made my home office space have life.
customer_reviews.author: Cut33pie

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new pack for the new house I moved into and love how they transform my walls and ceiling into my own personal galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stickers! You can even restick them over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

product_meta.title: PARLAIM Wall Stickers for Bedroom Living Room, Polka Dot Wall Decals for Kids Boys and Girls (130 Circles)
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL COLORFUL CIRCLES :130 Pieces Multi Color Polka Dots Wall sticker Color circle wall Decal with 3 size for Children room Removable Decorative stickers.

Easy Peel & Apply Well - Just peel and stick these vinyl decals on any clean and smooth surface to quickly add a unique style to your nursery, living room, bathroom, bedroom or anywhere else you want a pop of color .

Easy Removable & Safe - If you don’t like the initial placement, you could easily remove the polka dot decals with little effort and change another places no messy residue, making it perfect for that person who loves to change styles with the seasons.

Long Lasting & Good Adhesiveness - Regular brand manufacturers produced, quality assurance. The effect is perfect as hand-painted picture. Indoor wall tiling non-human causes or light environment can be guaranteed five years without fading does not fall off.
100% Satisfy Guarantee - For any reason, you don't love our polka dots decals, just return It and we'll refund every penny .You can add to cart now!
